dict.string:
Adobe's Utah office is in Lehi, just 25 minutes south of Salt Lake City. It is home to more than 900 employees who work at a newly built state-of-the-art campus and building with panoramic views, a full gym, and an NBA size basketball court, providing a unique work/life balance combining a spirit of innovation and abundant recreational opportunities. The team in Utah is focused on engineering, product development, sales, marketing, and operations for the industry-leading Adobe® Marketing Cloud.
Employees enjoy the diverse seasons and landscapes that offer a variety of recreational opportunities. It is possible to mountain bike, golf, water ski, and snowmobile — all in one day. Utah, host of the 2002 Olympic Winter Games, is home to many world-class ski resorts that consistently produce the "greatest snow on earth," over three million acres of breathtaking forest land, and more than 100 golf courses offering spectacular surroundings at affordable prices.
Utah is the proud home of a terrific sports community on the professional level with Utah Jazz basketball and Real Salt Lake soccer, as well as several local colleges/universities competing at the NCAA Division 1 level: Brigham Young University, University of Utah, Utah State University, and others.
